resp = client.ingest.put_pipeline(
    id="set_bar",
    description="sets the value of bar from the field foo",
    processors=[
        {
            "set": {
                "field": "bar",
                "copy_from": "foo"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.ingest.simulate(
    id="set_bar",
    docs=[
        {
            "_source": {
                "foo": [
                    "foo1",
                    "foo2"
                ]
            }
        }
    ],
)
